data.title: Ohio Northern University
data.meta_description:
p>&bull; 1,466-1,155-20 (.559) all-time record in 119-season program history from 1891-2024</p>
<p>&bull; 61 total winning seasons in program history ...
data.text:
• 1,466-1,155-20 (.559) all-time record in 119-season program history from 1891-2024

• 61 total winning seasons in program history, including 27 20-plus win seasons

• Two 30-plus win seasons, including a program-best 33 wins in 1995

• Eight NCAA Tournament appearances

• 21 OAC Tournament appearances

• 4 OAC Tournament titles - 1974, 1976, 1982, 1983

• Appeared in 5 of last 6 OAC Tournaments from 2018-24

• Caleb Thomas became the program's first-ever First-Team Google Cloud Academic All-America in 2019

• The team hit a program-record 90 doubles in 2022

• 11 All-Americans in program history (most recent was Jack Hutchins in 2023)

• Four Academic All-Americans - Brett Hastings (1994, 1995) and Caleb Thomas (2018, 2019)

• Two OAC Most Valuable Players

• 59 First-Team All-OAC honorees

• 207 All-OAC honorees

• 133 Academic All-OAC honorees

• 72 members in the 100-Hit Club led by Corey McMann who tallied 207 hits from 2019 to 2023

• McMann also owns the program record for doubles in a season (20) and career doubles (50)

• 31 members in the 100-Strikeout Club led by All-American Brett Roehm who tallied 392 strikeouts from 1992 to 1995
